تدشين برنامج سفراء بست باديز Launched the Best Buddies Ambassadors program
1  January,  2014
Launched the Best Buddies Ambassadors program, which is among the leadership skills development programs aimed at qualifying and training a number of individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities to become ambassadors in the local or international community through training courses and workshops to prepare them to become official speakers in the community during events, conferences, and media outlets.
